Suggested adjustment for Practice forming one basic chord (like G or C) for two minutes daily, focusing on finger placement and sound.: ['Place your guitar in a visible and easily accessible spot to reduce friction and remind you to practice.', 'Pair your guitar practice with an existing daily habit, like right after your morning coffee or before dinner, to help establish a routine.', 'Set a timer for two minutes to keep the practice session short and manageable, making it easier to commit to daily.']
